name: The Fool
upright: A fresh start awaits you. Trust in the journey and take that leap of faith. The universe supports your new adventure.
reversed: Recklessness and poor judgment. You may be taking unnecessary risks or being naive about a situation.
advice: Embrace the unknown. Sometimes the best plan is no plan at all.

name: The Magician
upright: You have all the tools and resources you need. Channel your willpower and make things happen. Your potential is limitless.
reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, or untapped talents. You may be using your abilities for the wrong purposes.
advice: Focus your energy. You are more powerful than you realize.

name: The High Priestess
upright: Trust your intuition. The answers you seek are within. Pay attention to your dreams and inner voice.
reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, withdrawal. You may be ignoring your inner wisdom.
advice: Be still and listen. The truth reveals itself in silence.

name: The Empress
upright: Abundance flows to you. Nurture yourself and others. A period of growth, creativity, and sensual pleasure.
reversed: Creative block, dependence on others, or neglecting self-care. Reconnect with nature and your body.
advice: Create beauty in your life. Let yourself receive.

name: The Emperor
upright: Take charge and establish order. Your leadership is needed. Build solid foundations for lasting success.
reversed: Domination, excessive control, inflexibility. You may be too rigid or power-hungry.
advice: Lead with wisdom, not force. Structure brings freedom.

name: The Hierophant
upright: Seek guidance from a teacher or mentor. Honor tradition and established systems. Spiritual growth through learning.
reversed: Personal beliefs challenged, rebellion against tradition, new approaches needed.
advice: Learn from those who came before, then forge your own path.

name: The Lovers
upright: A significant relationship or choice. Alignment of values and mutual attraction. Choose with your heart.
reversed: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values. A difficult choice between head and heart.
advice: Choose love. In every decision, ask what love would do.

name: The Chariot
upright: Victory through determination. You can overcome any obstacle with focused willpower. Charge ahead with confidence.
reversed: Lack of control, direction, or aggression. You may be trying to force outcomes.
advice: Stay focused on your goal. Victory requires both strength and strategy.

name: Strength
upright: True strength comes from within. Use compassion and patience to overcome challenges. Gentle persistence wins.
reversed: Self-doubt, weakness, insecurity. You may be losing confidence or acting aggressively.
advice: Be gentle with yourself and others. Kindness is the ultimate strength.

name: The Hermit
upright: Take time for solitude and reflection. The answers you seek are found within. A period of spiritual growth.
reversed: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal. You may be retreating too much from the world.
advice: Withdraw to recharge, but remember to return to share your light.

name: Wheel of Fortune
upright: A turning point. Fate is in your favor. Embrace change — what goes around comes around in the best way.
reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, breaking cycles. External forces may feel beyond your control.
advice: Accept that change is constant. Ride the wheel with grace.

name: Justice
upright: Fairness and truth prevail. Legal matters resolve in your favor. Take responsibility for your actions.
reversed: Unfairness, dishonesty, lack of accountability. The truth may be hidden.
advice: Act with integrity. The truth always comes to light.

name: The Hanged Man
upright: Surrender and see things from a new angle. This pause is necessary. Let go of control to gain true understanding.
reversed: Delays, resistance to sacrifice, stalling. You may be stuck in old patterns.
advice: Sometimes doing nothing is the most powerful action.

name: Death
upright: A major transformation. Something must end for something new to begin. Embrace the change — rebirth awaits.
reversed: Resistance to change, fear of endings, stagnation. You're clinging to what no longer serves you.
advice: Let go gracefully. Every ending is a new beginning in disguise.

name: Temperance
upright: Find your middle ground. Patience and moderation bring harmony. Blend opposing forces into something beautiful.
reversed: Imbalance, excess, lack of patience. You may be pushing too hard in one direction.
advice: Balance is not standing still — it's the art of moving gracefully.

name: The Devil
upright: Examine what holds you captive. Unhealthy attachments or addictions need addressing. You have more power than you think.
reversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, overcoming addiction, freedom. Breaking free from chains.
advice: Recognize your chains. Awareness is the first step to freedom.

name: The Tower
upright: Sudden, dramatic change. Structures built on false foundations crumble. Painful but necessary destruction leads to truth.
reversed: Avoiding disaster, fear of change, delaying the inevitable. The tower will fall eventually.
advice: When the tower falls, look for the light in the rubble.

name: The Star
upright: Hope and healing after the storm. Your faith is renewed. You're exactly where you're meant to be. Wish upon this star.
reversed: Lack of faith, despair, disconnection from purpose. Don't lose hope.
advice: Keep your eyes on the stars. Hope is always available to you.

name: The Moon
upright: Things are not what they seem. Trust your intuition to navigate through uncertainty. Face your fears.
reversed: Release of fear, clarity emerging, truth revealed. The fog is lifting.
advice: Walk through the darkness with courage. Dawn is coming.

name: The Sun
upright: Joy, success, and abundance! The sun shines on you. Celebrate life and share your warmth with others.
reversed: Temporary sadness, lack of clarity, diminished joy. The sun is still there behind the clouds.
advice: Shine your light. Your joy inspires everyone around you.

name: Judgement
upright: A spiritual awakening. Answer your higher calling. Reflect on your past to make better future decisions.
reversed: Self-doubt, refusal of self-examination, ignoring the call. Don't avoid honest self-reflection.
advice: Rise to your calling. You are being asked to become who you truly are.

name: The World
upright: Completion and fulfillment! A major cycle ends in triumph. You've achieved what you set out to do. Celebrate!
reversed: Incomplete, shortcuts, delays in completion. You're almost there — don't give up now.
advice: Honor your journey. You've earned this moment of wholeness.

name: Ace of Wands
upright: A spark of creative inspiration. A new opportunity ignites your passion. Say yes!
reversed: Delays, lack of motivation, missed opportunity.
advice: Strike while the iron is hot.

name: Two of Wands
upright: You're ready to plan your next big move. The world is yours — dream big and take action.
reversed: Fear of the unknown, lack of planning, playing it safe.
advice: Dream bigger than your comfort zone allows.

name: Three of Wands
upright: Your plans are taking shape. Look beyond your immediate surroundings for opportunity.
reversed: Delays in plans, frustration with pace, limited thinking.
advice: Patience. Your ships are coming in.

name: Four of Wands
upright: Celebration time! A milestone achieved. Gather your loved ones and enjoy this moment.
reversed: Lack of harmony at home, feeling unwelcome, personal celebration delayed.
advice: Celebrate every victory, no matter how small.

name: Five of Wands
upright: Healthy competition pushes you to be better. Expect some disagreements but they lead to growth.
reversed: Avoiding conflict, inner conflict, finding common ground.
advice: Channel competitive energy into growth, not destruction.

name: Six of Wands
upright: Public recognition and victory! Your hard work pays off. Enjoy the spotlight you've earned.
reversed: Ego, fall from grace, lack of recognition.
advice: Accept praise gracefully, and remember to lift others up.

name: Seven of Wands
upright: Stand your ground. You're being challenged but you have the high ground. Defend your position.
reversed: Giving up, overwhelmed, admitting defeat.
advice: You've earned your place. Don't let anyone push you off the hill.

name: Eight of Wands
upright: Things are moving fast! Messages, travel, and rapid progress. Hold on and enjoy the ride.
reversed: Delays, frustration, slowing down. Patience is needed.
advice: When the wind is at your back, sail!

name: Nine of Wands
upright: You're battle-worn but still standing. One more push and you'll reach the finish line. Don't give up now.
reversed: Exhaustion, giving up, paranoia. You need rest before the final push.
advice: You're closer than you think. Rest, then charge.

name: Ten of Wands
upright: You're carrying too much. Delegate or drop what's not essential. Success shouldn't crush you.
reversed: Learning to delegate, releasing burden, finding easier ways.
advice: Put down what isn't yours to carry.

name: Page of Wands
upright: A new adventure calls! Explore with childlike curiosity and enthusiasm.
reversed: Lack of direction, procrastination, creating problems.
advice: Follow your curiosity wherever it leads.

name: Knight of Wands
upright: Charge forward with passion and confidence. An exciting journey or project begins.
reversed: Hasty decisions, scattered energy, recklessness.
advice: Channel your fire with purpose, not just passion.

name: Queen of Wands
upright: Own your power with grace. You inspire others with your confidence and warmth.
reversed: Self-doubt, jealousy, demanding behavior.
advice: Lead with warmth and watch the world follow.

name: King of Wands
upright: A natural leader who turns vision into reality. Take bold action and inspire others.
reversed: Impulsive, overbearing, unrealistic expectations.
advice: True leadership is service, not dominance.

name: Ace of Cups
upright: An overflow of love and emotion. New relationships, deepened connections, or creative inspiration.
reversed: Blocked emotions, emptiness, repressed feelings.
advice: Open your heart. Love is trying to reach you.

name: Two of Cups
upright: A beautiful connection. Mutual love, respect, and attraction. A significant partnership forms.
reversed: Imbalance in relationship, breakup, miscommunication.
advice: Great relationships require equal giving and receiving.

name: Three of Cups
upright: Celebrate with your tribe! Friendship, community, and joyful gatherings bring happiness.
reversed: Gossip, overindulgence, isolation from friends.
advice: Joy is multiplied when shared with others.

name: Four of Cups
upright: You may be overlooking an opportunity while lost in thought. Look around — a gift awaits.
reversed: Awareness, acceptance, moving forward.
advice: Gratitude opens the door to what you've been missing.

name: Five of Cups
upright: Grief and disappointment. It's okay to mourn, but don't forget the cups still standing.
reversed: Acceptance, moving on, finding peace.
advice: Turn around. There is still so much left to cherish.

name: Six of Cups
upright: Happy memories and nostalgia. Reconnect with your inner child or someone from your past.
reversed: Living in the past, unrealistic memories, moving forward.
advice: Honor the past, but live in the present.

name: Seven of Cups
upright: Many options before you, some real and some illusions. Discern what truly matters before choosing.
reversed: Clarity, making a choice, focusing priorities.
advice: Not every shiny thing is gold. Choose wisely.

name: Eight of Cups
upright: It's time to walk away from what no longer fulfills you. Seek deeper meaning.
reversed: Fear of change, staying in a bad situation, aimless drifting.
advice: The bravest thing is walking away from what isn't working.

name: Nine of Cups
upright: The wish card! Your dreams are coming true. Deep emotional satisfaction and contentment.
reversed: Greed, dissatisfaction despite having enough, inner emptiness.
advice: Make a wish. The universe is listening.

name: Ten of Cups
upright: Ultimate emotional fulfillment. Family harmony, lasting love, and true happiness.
reversed: Family conflict, broken home, unrealistic expectations of happiness.
advice: This is what it all looks like when it comes together.

name: Page of Cups
upright: A message of love or creative inspiration arrives. Stay open to emotional surprises.
reversed: Emotional immaturity, creative block, oversensitivity.
advice: Stay open to magic. It often arrives unexpectedly.

name: Knight of Cups
upright: A romantic proposal or creative pursuit calls you forward. Follow your heart.
reversed: Moodiness, unrealistic expectations, jealousy.
advice: Let your heart lead, but bring your head along.

name: Queen of Cups
upright: Deep empathy and emotional intelligence guide you. Trust your feelings and nurture others.
reversed: Emotional insecurity, codependency, martyrdom.
advice: Your sensitivity is a superpower, not a weakness.

name: King of Cups
upright: Master of emotions. You balance heart and mind with wisdom and calm.
reversed: Emotional manipulation, moodiness, volatility.
advice: Feel everything, but let wisdom guide your response.

name: Ace of Swords
upright: A mental breakthrough! Clarity cuts through confusion. A powerful new idea or truth emerges.
reversed: Confusion, misinformation, chaos of thought.
advice: The truth will set you free. Seek clarity above comfort.

name: Two of Swords
upright: A difficult decision weighs on you. Remove the blindfold and face the truth to move forward.
reversed: Information overload, overwhelm, lesser of two evils.
advice: Avoiding a decision is itself a decision. Choose.

name: Three of Swords
upright: Heartbreak and emotional pain. Allow yourself to grieve, but know this pain will pass.
reversed: Recovery, forgiveness, moving past grief.
advice: Even broken hearts heal. Give yourself time and grace.

name: Four of Swords
upright: Rest and recharge. You've been through a lot. Take time to heal before your next battle.
reversed: Restlessness, burnout, refusal to rest.
advice: Rest is not laziness. It's preparation for what's next.

name: Five of Swords
upright: A hollow victory or painful defeat. Ask yourself: is winning worth the cost?
reversed: Reconciliation, making amends, moving past conflict.
advice: Choose your battles wisely. Not every fight is worth winning.

name: Six of Swords
upright: Moving away from turbulence toward calmer waters. A necessary transition brings relief.
reversed: Resistance to change, unresolved baggage, stuck.
advice: Leave the storm behind. Calmer waters await.

name: Seven of Swords
upright: Someone may not be playing fair — possibly even you. Review your strategy and ethics.
reversed: Coming clean, confession, getting caught.
advice: Shortcuts built on deception always cost more in the end.

name: Eight of Swords
upright: You feel trapped, but the prison is of your own making. You have more freedom than you realize.
reversed: Self-acceptance, new perspective, freedom of thought.
advice: Open your eyes. The cage door has always been open.

name: Nine of Swords
upright: Anxiety and worry keep you up at night. Most of your fears won't come true. Seek support.
reversed: Hope, reaching out, overcoming anxiety.
advice: Talk to someone. Worry shared is worry halved.

name: Ten of Swords
upright: Rock bottom. A painful ending. But look — the sun is rising. The worst is over.
reversed: Recovery, regeneration, resisting ending.
advice: When you hit rock bottom, the only way is up.

name: Page of Swords
upright: A curious, sharp mind seeks truth. New ideas and communication breakthroughs.
reversed: Gossip, hurtful words, deception.
advice: Ask questions, but be kind with the answers you find.

name: Knight of Swords
upright: Charge forward with intellectual clarity and determination. Swift action brings results.
reversed: Impulsive, all talk no action, aggressive.
advice: Think, then act. Speed without direction is just chaos.

name: Queen of Swords
upright: Speak your truth with clarity and compassion. Set boundaries without guilt.
reversed: Cold, bitter, overly critical.
advice: Honesty delivered with kindness is the sharpest sword.

name: King of Swords
upright: Make decisions with logic, fairness, and moral authority. Your judgment is sound.
reversed: Manipulation, tyranny, abuse of power.
advice: Power without compassion is tyranny. Lead with both.

name: Ace of Pentacles
upright: A golden opportunity for financial growth or new career path. Plant this seed wisely.
reversed: Missed opportunity, poor planning, lack of foresight.
advice: This seed can grow into an empire. Tend it with care.

name: Two of Pentacles
upright: Juggling multiple priorities with skill. Stay flexible and maintain balance.
reversed: Overwhelm, disorganization, overcommitted.
advice: You can juggle anything, but not everything at once.

name: Three of Pentacles
upright: Teamwork makes the dream work. Your skills are valued. Collaborate for greater success.
reversed: Poor teamwork, disorganization, working alone.
advice: No masterpiece was ever created in isolation.

name: Four of Pentacles
upright: Financial stability through careful management. But don't hold on so tight you can't enjoy life.
reversed: Generosity, releasing control, spending freely.
advice: Security is important, but don't let it become a prison.

name: Five of Pentacles
upright: Financial or spiritual hardship. You're not alone — look for the help that's available to you.
reversed: Recovery, finding help, spiritual growth through hardship.
advice: Hard times don't last. Look for the door that's always open.

name: Six of Pentacles
upright: A time of giving and receiving. Share your abundance or accept help graciously.
reversed: Strings attached, one-sided generosity, debt.
advice: Give what you can, receive what you need.

name: Seven of Pentacles
upright: Your investments are growing. Be patient — the harvest is coming. Evaluate your progress.
reversed: Impatience, poor returns, wasted effort.
advice: The best things take time. Keep watering your garden.

name: Eight of Pentacles
upright: Dedicated practice leads to mastery. Keep honing your craft. Hard work pays off.
reversed: Perfectionism, lack of motivation, sloppy work.
advice: Master your craft one day at a time.

name: Nine of Pentacles
upright: You've built something beautiful through your own effort. Enjoy the fruits of your labor.
reversed: Financial setback, over-reliance on others, superficiality.
advice: You earned this abundance. Savor every moment.

name: Ten of Pentacles
upright: Lasting wealth, family security, and legacy. You've built something that endures beyond you.
reversed: Family disputes over money, loss of legacy, financial failure.
advice: True wealth is what you leave behind for others.

name: Page of Pentacles
upright: A promising new venture or learning opportunity. Stay curious and work hard.
reversed: Lack of progress, procrastination, missed opportunities.
advice: Every empire started with a single determined step.

name: Knight of Pentacles
upright: Steady, methodical progress. Not glamorous, but incredibly effective. Keep going.
reversed: Laziness, boredom, stagnation.
advice: Slow and steady doesn't just finish — it wins.

name: Queen of Pentacles
upright: Create a warm, abundant home. You balance practicality with nurturing beautifully.
reversed: Work-life imbalance, neglecting self, financial insecurity.
advice: Tend your garden — both the one outside and the one within.

name: King of Pentacles
upright: Financial mastery and material abundance. Lead with discipline and generosity.
reversed: Greed, materialism, poor financial management.
advice: Build an empire, but don't forget why you started.
